#  F7  | rs2 | rs1 |f3 | rd  | opcode
instruction                               Func  RegAddrA RegAddrB DestReg RS1v RS2v RDv Left        Right       Extra        RegDataA    RegDataB    PC           Stall
# LUI (U)
0000000_00000_00000_111_00001_0110111     LUI-- 00000    00000    00001   0    0    1   00_00_00_00 00_00_00_00 00_00_70_00  00_00_00_AA 00_00_00_BB 00_00_11_11  0 
# AUIPC (U)
